nodes.text: Meinar was a male Human captain of the Galactic Republic during the Third Galactic War. He served as a Republic Guard in 3626 BBY

Meinar appears as a boss in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Onslaught expansion. Meinar only makes an appearance in the Imperial storyline, given that his role is replaced by Ziliss in the Republic storyline.

In the Imperial storyline, Meinar, along with fellow Republic soldiers Corrik and Osonu, confronts the Commander, Darth Krovos, and Darth Rivix, when they arrive at the Dantooine Jedi Enclave to investigate the whereabouts of Darth Malgus. In the end, Meinar and his compatriots are slain in the encounter.
